name: ElsysHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart camera
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HOW TO CONNECT:
1. Search for 'Elsys Home' skill on the Alexa app
2. Press the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your Elsys Home account and password to link your Elsys account.
4. Select a camera to bind
5. After your Elsys account has been successfully linked. Talk to your Echo and say: "Alexa, show my camera".

TIPS: To use this skill, it is necessary to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the Elsys Home application.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show my camera

Note: Check the compatibility of your camera and also your Echo device.
Camera models Actually supported: ESC-WR3F, ESC-WR4F
